name: The Girl With Vacant Eyes
description:
One day, a high-school student named Hayden meets a mysterious young girl named Clarissa. However, as time goes by, it becomes obvious that she isn't what she seems...

Either find a way to escape this situation safe and sound, or die trying.

This is my very first visual novel I've decided to release. It's short and rather linear. It includes 8 endings (6 bad endings, 1 neutral ending, and 1 true ending). Enjoy!

If there are any bugs, typos, or other problems, please let me know in the comments.
